channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Barclays’ bold £2 billion cost-cutting blitz boosts profits and sets stage for Tesco Bank takeover
item.description: Profit after tax climbed 23 percent to nearly £1.6 billion ($2.1 billion) in the three months to the end of September compared with one year earlier, ...

item.title: Barclays shares hit nine-year high after third quarter profit jumps 23%, beating expectations
item.description: British bank Barclays on Thursday reported £1.6 billion ($2 billion) net profit attributable to shareholders for the third quarter, beating expectatio...

item.title: Tesla says 'Model 2' is still on deck for 2025
Boeing machinists reject new labor contract, extending more than 5-week strike
item.description: Boeing machinists walked off the job on Sept. 13 after overwhelmingly rejecting an earlier proposal.

item.title: 1-in-5 McDonald’s have pulled Quarter Pounders from the menu as E. coli outbreak is investigated
item.description: A preliminary investigation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration suggested fresh slivered onions that are served raw on Quarter Pounder hamburgers...

item.title: Seadrill stock jumps on report of talks with Transocean
Unilever sales growth accelerates under CEO’s overhaul plan
item.description: Revenue increased 4.5% in the third quarter, beating the 4.3% expected by analysts, the maker of soap and stock cubes said Thursday.

item.title: Goldman Sachs-backed Simbe raises $50M in Series C funding to bolster retail robot business
item.description: Simbe is now working with 29 retail brands.

item.title: UPS reports rise in third-quarter profit on rebounding volumes, cost cuts
item.description: UPS reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, as rebounding volumes ahead of the holiday season lifted revenue.

item.title: Boeing stock falls in premarket after pay deal rejected
Boeing factory workers vote to reject contract, will continue 6-week strike
Tesla shares are soaring After EV maker's earnings report. What analysts are saying
item.description: The Elon Musk-helmed EV company surpassed earnings estimates on Wednesday.

item.title: Hyundai Motor's third quarter profit misses forecast as demand slows; shares slide
item.description: Hyundai Motor warned on Thursday of slowing demand and intensifying competition, but stuck to its 2024 earnings target.

item.title: UPS’s stock surges after revenue beats for first time in 2 years
Ex-Obama aide explains why Kamala Harris is losing Gen Z men to Donald Trump
item.description: Harris isn’t meeting young male voters where they are—or where they get their news: “This is what Trump is doing every day.”
